nodes.title: Python developer
nodes.shortDescription: Design, build and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable REST APIs. A strong team player with a commitment to perfection.

nodes.title: Front end developer
nodes.shortDescription: Experience in ReactJS and interested in building performant web apps. Responsible for architecting and building web apps.

nodes.title: Mobile app developer
nodes.shortDescription: Experience in React Native and interested in building performant mobile apps on both the iOS and Android platforms.
